About me

I'm a Product Designer and UX Designer with Eight years of experience. I love to solve problems, focussing on details rather than making some random UI. I mostly work with enterprise solutions, B2B software, SaaS applications, Mobile apps, and other challenging stuff.


Technology/Tools:

I mostly use Figma for Interface design. I'd been using Adobe Suits for a very long time in my early years. Besides these, I use paper/pencil for sketching, sometimes Balsamiq or other wireframing apps. For collaboration, I love Telegram, Slack, Asana, etc. 

I'm not a coder, but I have good knowledge on how the technology and the design combination work. My understanding on HTML/CSS and programming basic knowledge helps me to design a good product properly.
